Description:
Detects potential local file read vulnerability in JVM based apps.
If the exceptions are caused due to user input and contain path traversal payloads then it's a red flag.


Author: Moti Harmats
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Local File Read Vulnerability In JVM Based Application
Query: sourcetype like 'jvm-%' eql select * from _source_ where ( = 'filenotfoundexception' and  = '/../../..')
